column4: Really?  Then maybe you can tell me why my machine locks up whenever I try to do anything openGL
hmm, perhaps some AGP motherboard crap. my ti4200 works liek a charm
What do you mean "AGP motherboard crap"?
well, there are 2 AGP bus drivers I think...
have you read the binary driver readme?
try it, it has some troubleshooting help. new nv drivers have worked great for me
and it appears that both nvidia_agp and agpart are running
I was kinda hoping you'd tell me.
I won't, because I haven't had the prob myself. You should really consult the driver readme
I recall there was a chapter about that
Where do I find this binary driver readme?
if that doesn't help go to nvidias homepage and d/l the driver
I cant say directly because I'm on my soon-to-be-hoary box ATM
